trends: There have been no other sightings in Highland Township
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Bright Light above road at tree level
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving in my car on the way home as I came down Hickory Ridge Road and I saw a bright light above the trees I thought it was a airplane or something like that But when I got closer to the thing my car's power started fluctuating and my car shut off as the light went over my car the thing looked like a bright oval shaped vehicule and it moved very slow at times and very very fast at other times and would stay in one area, well my first reaction was I thought I was seeing something but when my car turned off I realized that something wasnt right and I knew I had saw something incredible well after 15 minutes the thing just disappered and I was able to start my car and so was the lady that was behind me when are cars died.
